title: EVENTS – hololive（ホロライブ）公式サイト

items.title: hololive STAGE World Tour ’25 -Synchronize!-
items.author: narita
items.content:
hololive STAGE World Tour ’25 -Synchronize!-

Momosuzu Nene / Kureiji Ollie / Mori Calliope / IRyS / Nerissa Ravencroft

Sydney Guests ： Ouro Kronii / Hakos Baelz Hong Kong Guests ： Tokino Sora / Sakura Miko*Guest details other than Sydney and Hong Kong will be announced later.

Date ： July 12-13, 2025 ［Concert Date ： July 12（Saturday）in local time］

Venue ： ICC Sydney, Darling Harbour Theatre

Address ： 14 Darling Drive, Sydneyhttps://smash.org.au/holo2025 Special Guests ： Ouro Kronii / Hakos Baelz

Concert Date ： July 27, 2025（Sunday）in local time

Venue ： Hopewell Grand Ballroom

Address ： 15 Kennedy Road, Wan Chai, Hong Konghttps://www.infinite1.jp/events/hololive25 Special Guests ： Tokino Sora / Sakura MikoMore to be announced on a later date.

■ Anime Revolution （Vancouver） Date ： August 1-3, 2025 ［Concert Date ： August 3（Sunday）in local time］

Venue ： Vancouver Convention Centre

Address ： 1055 Canada Pl, Vancouver, BC V6C 0C3https://summer.animerevolution.ca

■ Anime NYC （New York City） Date ： August 21-24, 2025 ［Concert Date ： August 22（Friday）in local time］

Venue ： JAVITS CONVENTION CENTER

Address ： 429 11th Ave, New York, NY 10001https://animenyc.com

Concert Date ： December 20, 2025（Saturday）in local timeMore to be announced on a later date.

*Additional concerts will be announced at a later date. Stay tuned to the official website and social media for more concert announcements.

Ticket information will be announced by each event organizer. Please check their event website or follow their social media for the updates.
